languages.text: {n}Торбальд явился не один, а в сопровождении молодого брата по оружию. Бросив на Ульфара насмешливый взгляд, он зычно произносит:{/n} "Торбальд Железношкурый здесь. Зачем позвал{mf||а} меня, Вольный Торговец?"
{n}Thorbald has not come alone, but with a young brother in arms. With a mocking glance at Ulfar, he bellows,{/n} "Thorbald Ironhide is here. Why have you summoned me, Rogue Trader?"
languages.original_text: {n}Торбальд явился не один, а в сопровождении молодого брата по оружию. Бросив на Ульфара насмешливый взгляд, он зычно произносит:{/n} "Торбальд Железношкурый здесь. Зачем позвал{mf||а} меня, Вольный Торговец?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald has not come alone, but with a young brother in arms. With a mocking glance at Ulfar, he bellows,{/n} "Thorbald Ironhide is here. Why have you summoned me, Rogue Trader?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}索巴德并不是一个人来的，他还带了一位年轻的战友。他面带嘲弄地看了乌尔法一眼，随后高声喊道。{/n}“索巴德·铁皮在此。你为何将我召唤而来，行商浪人？”
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald has not come alone, but with a young brother in arms. With a mocking glance at Ulfar, he bellows,{/n} "Thorbald Ironhide is here. Why have you summoned me, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: {n}索巴德并不是一个人来的，他还带了一位年轻的战友。他面带嘲弄地看了乌尔法一眼，随后高声喊道。{/n}“索巴德·铁皮在此。你为何将我召唤而来，行商浪人？”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}トールバルドはひとりではなく、武装した若い同胞を一名連れてきた。ウルファーにあざけりの視線を送ると怒鳴り声をあげる。{/n}「トールバルド・アイアンハイドが来たぞ。俺を呼びつけたのはどういうわけだ、自由開拓者」
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald has not come alone, but with a young brother in arms. With a mocking glance at Ulfar, he bellows,{/n} "Thorbald Ironhide is here. Why have you summoned me, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: {n}トールバルドはひとりではなく、武装した若い同胞を一名連れてきた。ウルファーにあざけりの視線を送ると怒鳴り声をあげる。{/n}「トールバルド・アイアンハイドが来たぞ。俺を呼びつけたのはどういうわけだ、自由開拓者」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald no ha acudido solo, sino con un hermano menor en sus brazos. Mirando jocosamente a Ulfar, ruge:{/n} «Soy Thorbald Piel de Hierro. ¿A qué debo su llamado, Comerciante Independiente?».
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald has not come alone, but with a young brother in arms. With a mocking glance at Ulfar, he bellows,{/n} "Thorbald Ironhide is here. Why have you summoned me, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald no ha acudido solo, sino con un hermano menor en sus brazos. Mirando jocosamente a Ulfar, ruge:{/n} «Soy Thorbald Piel de Hierro. ¿A qué debo su llamado, Comerciante Independiente?».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald n'est pas venu seul, mais accompagné d'un jeune frère d'armes. Avec un regard moqueur pour Ulfar, il s'écrie :{/n} « Thorbald Peau-de-Fer est là. Pourquoi m'avez-vous fait mander, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald has not come alone, but with a young brother in arms. With a mocking glance at Ulfar, he bellows,{/n} "Thorbald Ironhide is here. Why have you summoned me, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald n'est pas venu seul, mais accompagné d'un jeune frère d'armes. Avec un regard moqueur pour Ulfar, il s'écrie :{/n} « Thorbald Peau-de-Fer est là. Pourquoi m'avez-vous fait mander, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald ist nicht alleine gekommen, sondern mit einem jungen Waffenbruder. Mit einem spöttischen Seitenblick auf Ulfar bellt er:{/n} "Thorbald Eisenhaut ist zur Stelle. Weshalb habt Ihr mich gerufen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald has not come alone, but with a young brother in arms. With a mocking glance at Ulfar, he bellows,{/n} "Thorbald Ironhide is here. Why have you summoned me, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald ist nicht alleine gekommen, sondern mit einem jungen Waffenbruder. Mit einem spöttischen Seitenblick auf Ulfar bellt er:{/n} "Thorbald Eisenhaut ist zur Stelle. Weshalb habt Ihr mich gerufen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald yalnız değil, yanında genç bir silah arkadaşını da getirmiş. Ulfar'a dalga geçercesine bakıp haykırıyor. {/n} "Thorbald Demirpost teşrif etti. Beni neden çağırdın Hür Tacir?"
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald has not come alone, but with a young brother in arms. With a mocking glance at Ulfar, he bellows,{/n} "Thorbald Ironhide is here. Why have you summoned me, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald tek başına değil, yanında genç bir silah arkadaşını da getirmiş. Ulfar'a dalga geçercesine bakıp haykırıyor. {/n} "Thorbald Demirpost burada. Neden beni çağırdın Hür Tacir?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
